detail.Title: LE SSERAFIM - HOT (Areia Remix)
detail.Description:

Thank you for watching this video! My name is Jun Areia and I'm an artist developer and producer based in Seoul, South Korea since 2009. Through Areia Remix Evolution, I attempt to offer re-imagined EDM versions of your favorite K-pop songs and share my love for the Korean culture to the world!

‚≠ê Support My Vision:
If you enjoy my work, consider supporting me on Patreon for exclusive benefits, including early access to remixes, full-length Original Mixes and DJ ready Club Mixes, and access to the Production and Inner Circles where you can help shape the remixes and Areia Creations future! Your support helps me grow my efforts in producing original K-pop artists and building my company in Korea!
http://www.patreon.com/areiacreations
Or you can just buy me a coffee! https://www.buymeacoffee.com/areiacreations

üí° Got a song you'd love to see remixed? Join Areia Creations Discord to share your ideas and connect with the community!
üéµ Don‚Äôt forget to like and comment under this video and subscribe for more K-pop remixes!

‚≠ê Credits:
This remix is not a commercial release and is created for promotional and entertainment purposes only; all Youtube ad revenue is automatically received by the original K-pop artists.
The music in this remix is 100% original and was produced by me. Only the vocals are used from the original song.
